main event: A civilian in Colorado Springs, Colorado observed a bright, circular object that changed colors from red to green to white and hovered in the sky for about 1.5 hours.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 35-40 feet in diameter and was described as silvery-white in color.
The object was observed hovering and moving about silently for approximately 15-20 minutes before disappearing from view.
No definite conclusion could be reached about the identity or nature of the object based on the information provided.
The report was carefully evaluated and analyzed, but the object did not match any known conventional aircraft or other identifiable aerial phenomena.
A second report describes an object that changed colors from red to green to white, appeared to have oblong windows, and moved up and down in the sky for about 1.5 hours before disappearing.
sighted object: bright, circular object that changed colors
photographs: yes, the report includes a photograph of the UFO
